content.text:
# Recent ElizaOS Repository Updates

## Features
- Added an update-cli command (PR #4170)
- Added ID to metadata source (PR #4168)
- Improved plugin installation management (PR #4177)
- Enhanced CLI update and plugin installation with package manager (PR #4176)

## Bug Fixes
- Fixed knowledge manager scroll issue (PR #4175)
- Resolved Twitter client creation failure (PR #4167)
- Fixed Telegram 'get world' functionality (PR #4166)
- Fixed Twitter interaction issues (PR #4165)
- Fixed Telegram to ElizaOS data model synchronization (PR #4137)
- Fixed version tag when importing plugins dynamically during runtime (PR #4183)
- Fixed space action (PR #4182)

## Refactoring & Other Changes
- Refactored OpenAI plugin (PR #4169)
- Implemented filtering for ignored Farcaster mentions (PR #4163)
- Updated dependencies through npm and yarn (PR #4141)
- Changed to camelCase on plugin export for local-ai (PR #4186)
- Removed import logic from core (PR #4184)
- Improved handling of dynamic-runtime import errors (PR #4179)
- Addressed module path issues (PR #4178)
- Updated documentation (PR #4114) and fixed documentation formatting (PR #4148)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository focusing on testing and plugin functionality improvements:

- HarshModi2005 contributed two PRs related to testing: PR #4171 for Plugin-Bootstrap Test Suite and PR #4173 for Test Coverage for plugin-bootstrap.

- ncale added message buttons functionality in PR #4174.

- Instrumentation improvements were made by Samarthsinghal28 (PR #4172) and Imsharad, who added 100% instrumentation coverage for the Twitter plugin (PR #4190).

- wtfsayo worked on plugin management with PR #4177 for better plugin install management and PR #4178 addressing module path issues.

- yungalgo submitted PR #4185 to make 'npm create eliza' and 'npx elizaos create' functionally identical.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed consistent activity over a two-day period. From April 3-4, 2025, there were 11 new pull requests with 12 merged, no new issues, and 14 active contributors. The following day (April 4-5, 2025) saw 13 new pull requests with 8 merged, 2 new issues, and 12 active contributors. Overall, the project maintained strong development momentum with a steady contributor base.

The provided sources mention 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' but do not provide any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions to the project. Without additional information, it's not possible to generate a detailed summary about the individual contributors, their roles, or the nature of their contributions to the elizaOS/eliza project.

categories.title: Twitter Integration Issues in Eliza Project

content.text:
Two issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository related to Twitter integration:

1. Issue #4181: Twitter interactions are being fetched, but reactions have not been implemented yet. This issue was reported by user tcm390.

2. Issue #4180: Twitter space functionality is not working properly. This issue was also reported by user tcm390.

Both issues appear to be related to incomplete or non-functioning Twitter features in the Eliza project.
